attributes.title: DELETE THIS QUICK
attributes.review: bruh i was waiting like a whole month for this to download and it didnt even like why it only do 1% every day?? and i have the latest iphone so dont tell me its because my phone cause i got it like a ago from the apple store. anyways this a horrible app !!! 😿😿

attributes.title: HORRIBLE AND DEPLORABLE
attributes.review: i opened the app and there was just??? furry p*rn??? i- what?? not even good stuff. like gross amateur filming and i think that mascot gritty was in it??? or a muppet idfk. also it gave my device a virus. now anytime i open a different app i get racist ads and U2 doing a cover of smash mouth plays idk. 0/10 but at least the app fits the trump vibes 🤷

attributes.title: Zero stars if I could
attributes.review: Listen this up and so far I don’t even know why he made it if I had the chance to just put negative like 10 stars I would what the hell does the orange potato think he is I would say Cheeto but he’s too fat for it so zero stars get this I’ll delete it now

attributes.title: Horrible 🤢🤮🤮🤮🤮
attributes.review: This is the worst app in the history of apps when I opened it to show my 4 year old and she saw the 🍊 she started crying. and it also played very inappropriate music while I was on it (super loud and woke up all 12 of my children).  So I will no longer be voting for this 🤢🤮🍊

attributes.title: NO
attributes.review: This app is completely and utterly awful! It took days to download on my HIGH SPEED Internet, and whenever it did, the buttons on the screen came off!! That has never happened before in any other thing I have ever gotten off the AppStore!! Atrocious!!

attributes.title: Terrible app
attributes.review: This app is one of the worst to ever be created. DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME WITH THIS APP!! It has terrible software are glitches out every ten seconds. Not to mention, after doing some research I discovered that Donald trump is a terrible person that no human should ever vote for. Take my word for and do some research. Do not support this man.

attributes.title: Would give 0 stars if I could 🤮
attributes.review: This app is terrible!!! Took a solid week to download and when it finally did it BROKE my phone!!! I had to take it to the Apple store to get it fixed. And to top it off it’s brought roaches to my home! I know a bad app when I see it 🤢🤮😤

attributes.title: worst app EVER!
attributes.review: i opened the app and right away i was shocked! it had taken all my personal information and locked me out. terrible deserves less than a one start review. whoever made this should have no authority over anyone because they are NOT fit to run anything!

attributes.title: Disgusting
attributes.review: I hate it so much that my phone doesn’t work right no more and that I had to delete apps to get this downloaded and it took days to download my game even crashed and now my audio doesn’t work and I have the latest phone.
